Pre-Game Insights: The Indonesian national team manager, Sumardji, issued a warning to the Bahrain Football Association (BFA) regarding concerns about laser attacks from supporters.
The Indonesian national team will face Bahrain in the Third Round of the 2026 World Cup Qualification at the Bahrain National Stadium, Riffa, on October 10, 2024.
Sumardji mentioned that the Japanese national team had previously complained about laser disturbances from Bahrain supporters during their match on September 10, 2024.
BFA promised to monitor supporters more strictly to prevent the use of lasers during the match against the Indonesian national team.
